author: roku
msg: - exclude all xalan jars from cocoon webapp space during copy process in build scripts
- updated nekopull to version 0.2.4 which fixes an xerces-2.6.2 issue with the class ObjectFactory which has been removed from xerces due to security issues
- moved nekopull libs from docs-new pub to global WEB-INF/lib
